name: SkySchool of East Texas
about: SkySchool of East Texas, located at the Athens Municipal Airport, offers comprehensive flight training under the Part 61 program. Established to provide flexible and personalized instruction, the school caters to students with varying schedules and goals. With operations from sunrise to sunset seven days a week, SkySchool allows for rigorous or leisurely training paces, accommodating both professional and recreational pilots. The school utilizes online and soon-to-be classroom-based ground school programs and maintains a fleet for training and rental. Financing options are available, and the school is committed to efficient, safe, and smooth training from zero hours to certification. SkySchool of East Texas is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals with flexibility and professionalism.
